p: We are most interested in studying the intermolecular contacts, holding together or destabilizing the stacks of stars in the crystal. To probe them, we use the Hirshfeld surface analysis [ 65] ( Figure 4, left column) and plot the d e- d i diagrams ( Figure 4, right column). The color scheme of the surface codes the sign of the normalized contact distance d norm defined in terms of d e, d i and the van der Waals (vdW) radii of the atoms (see Section 4 for more detail).
